question: Will my information remain confidential?
answer: Yes, your information and data will be safe with us.

question: What if there are problems arising with the assigned Salesforce developer?
answer: SV Tech Soft ensures to provide you professional developers who will work right according to your business. If you still face difficulties with them, we will look into the matter and try our best to resolve it. We can also replace the developer for you if the issue still persists.

question: Will I get a report on a daily basis after hiring your Salesforce Developers?
answer: We will constantly stay in touch with you through remote communication platforms like Zoom, Skype, Google Meet, Hangouts, EMail and Phone. Our contractors/developers will provide updates about the work progress on a daily basis and work according to your feedback.
